main event: A witness reported seeing an unidentified flying object over Lowry AFB, Colorado in 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as egg-shaped and elongated, with a blinking white light.
The object was observed for about 20 seconds, initially zig-zagging before moving straight from north to south.
The witness was watching for an echo satellite at the time of the sighting.
Weather conditions were clear, with moderate winds from the west.
The report was submitted in accordance with Air Force Regulation 200-2.
sighted object: an egg-shaped, elongated object with a blinking white light
witnesses: at least one witness, likely a military officer
photographs: no photographs were present in the report
